summary: SummaryColor Wow Dream Coat Supernatural Spray is the #1 anti-frizz treatment that waterproofs your hair to stop frizz, even in the worst humidity.
details: DetailsBenefitsActivated by heat, effects last through 3 to 4 shampoosDream Coat Supernatural Spray provides heat protection. Do not exceed 380 F degrees for normal to coarse hair types. For chemically treated, fine, or fragile hair do not exceed 300 F degreesAdvanced anti-frizz formula leaves hair super glossy, glassy, ultra smoothGroundbreaking humidity-blocking technology stops moisture from wrecking your styleUltra-light frizz control spray feels like nothing is on the hairFeaturesInspired by textile technology, this humidity-proofing formula acts like a raincoat. It wraps each strand in an imperceptible, water-resistant barrier that causes water to bead up and roll off. So you get silky, glossy, glassy, frizz-free hair no matter the weather!Formulated WithoutParabenSulfateGlutenItem 2507216How To UseShampoo, condition, and towel dry.Divide hair into sections. Spray liberally and evenly on damp (not wet) hair. Do not apply other styling products while the hair is wet. You can apply styling products after completing the Dream Coat blow-dry.Requires blow-drying with tension to activate.For best results, use every three to four shampoos.IngredientsWater, Dipropylene Glycol, Polysilicone-29, DMDM Hydantoin, Propylene Glycol, Butylene Glycol, Iodopropynyl butylcarbamate, Panthenol, Hydrolyzed Keratin, Hydrolyzed Silk, Potassium Sorbate, Potassium Benzoate, Phenoxyethanol, Citric Acid.
how_to_use: Shampoo, condition, and towel dry.Divide hair into sections. Spray liberally and evenly on damp (not wet) hair. Do not apply other styling products while the hair is wet. You can apply styling products after completing the Dream Coat blow-dry.Requires blow-drying with tension to activate.For best results, use every three to four shampoos.

reviews.comments: My face broke out after using this and it just keeps getting worse. I've already washed it out twice with clarifying shampoo and my face is still reacting to this. As if that's not enough, my HAIR IS BREAKING LIKE STRAW! Never again. And the frizz!

reviews.headline: Yes
reviews.comments: I love this product. Keeps my hair from getting wavy due to humidity here in Va Beach Va.

reviews.headline: I would buy again
reviews.comments: I love this item to smooth my hair, I have curly hair

reviews.headline: The best non-frizz blow out product!
reviews.comments: This is the best product for frizzy hair or humid days. If you follow the directions and pull your hair taught when blow drying, your hair comes out so smooth and soft.

reviews.headline: Love WOW!
reviews.comments: I love using this product. I first used this product in Florida and my hair remained unfrizzy and smooth.

reviews.headline: Love WOW!!
reviews.comments: I first use this on my vacation trip in Florida and it worked every day my hair remained and frizzy and smooth

reviews.headline: Sticky, tangled mess
reviews.comments: I saw the hype for this product on TikTok and decided to give it a go; my hair is fine, wavy, and highlighted. The first time I tried this, I didn't notice much of a difference and I still had a little wave at the root. Also wasn't a huge fan of the smell. I thought I hadn't used enough product so decided to try it again a few weeks later and was left with frizzy ends. I just tried it again for the 3rd time in 3 months and my hair feels SO gross after this round: the residue makes it feel like my hair hasn't been washed in weeks (I just washed today) and I can't get a brush through it without a ton of breakage. Blow drying today was a nightmare and if I didn't have somewhere to be in an hour, I would've washed my hair again just to get this stuff out of it. If you have fine, wavy hair, I wouldn't recommend this.

reviews.headline: I will buy this product again!
reviews.comments: I was so pleased how well this product worked - no frizz after three days!

reviews.headline: Frizz control when you want to extend wash day
reviews.comments: I live using this to smooth out my curls one day after wash for blowout look.  It's very helpful.  I can't give it 5 stars as it's advertised with more hype than reality.  But it's still very good product.

reviews.headline: Yes
reviews.comments: Great Product hair smooth and shiny

reviews.headline: It actually works !
reviews.comments: This product worked exactly as promised. I wasn't expecting it to actually smooth my hair without it feeling sticky. I recommend this product. I'm actually looking forward to trying their other products soon.

reviews.headline: Works great but made my hands tingle
reviews.comments:
Beware! Theres some chemical in this that cannot be safe!
Yes it made my 2b fine wavy frizzy hair soft and bouncy with a simple blow dry using a barrel brush but it left the palms of my hands tingly and slightly burning in a very unpleasant way like id used a strong cleaning product without gloves! Its been hours now and my hands are still tingling. Whats in this? It cant be safe! Even if i wear gloves and also not fet it on my scalp, my hair will be touching rhe skin on my neck and shoulders. 
Tho it works well, I'll be returning Dream Coat. Beauty products really need to be regulated netter for unsafe chemicals!

reviews.headline: Water?
reviews.comments: This did absolutely nothing. Im honestly convinced someone at the store replaced it with water. No real shine factor my hair was still frizzy at the ends and didnt beat humidity. And i really tried to saturate my hair in this stuff and honestly my 5$ protector does better.

reviews.headline: Amazing Results
reviews.comments: My hair is very thick, course and wavy and super poofy in my humid climate. This stuff tames my hair leaving it is so soft and smooth without making it flat and heavy. Its like magic in a bottle!

reviews.headline: Wow!
reviews.comments: For frame of reference, I have naturally wavy hair and live in Florida. Wow! This really does work to keep my hair, soft and shiny and fairly frizz free. I do get a bit on the top with day two but nothing as it used to be. I do wash my hair every other day and I blow dry it on the wash days. I am able to easily go two - three days with frizz free hair. I love this and would absolutely continue to purchase it!

reviews.headline: Wouldn't buy again
reviews.comments: I didn't see a difference and for that price for such a small bottle is crazy I will not buy again

reviews.headline: Great Product
reviews.comments: This products smells awesome and give great shine to my hair without weighing it down.

reviews.headline: Amazing
reviews.comments: I have wavy, frizzy, fine hair and this stuff worked amazingly well.  I used only this after washing, sprayed it on wet and blow dried with a round brush dryer, and it stayed smooth for over 24 hours even in the Florida humidity.  It did not weigh my hair down or make it flat.  Highly recommend!

faceoff_positive.comments: At first I had thought this product was heavy and greasy until I realized it was actually a new conditioner I had used. This is in fact light weight. It leaves zero residue and as stated, you can use as much as you like and it doesn't negatively affect the hair. I parted my hair in sections and thoroughly sprayed root to ends. With that said, if you have long hair like mine, you have to imagine this wouldn't go incredibly far even with the 3-4 shampoos promise. With a hefty price tag, that's not a positive unless it's miraculous results. As instructed, I applied to wet hair, as well. I used a brush through dryer. FYI, if you get a good one, those things are great! In the end, I saw some nice shine, but it wasn't like glass even with careful hair straightening after the drying. It did look nice, smooth and healthy so I'll give it points for that. As far as humidity, I live in a sauna during the summer and moisture filled winters. It kills any hopes of straight, frizz free hair for me. I end up just letting it do it's thing and not fight it. My hair is loose wavy. This seemed to protect from humidity pretty dang well. I was really impressed by that. Are there cheaper products that will do the same? Possibly. I'd have to investigate further. That alone doesn't win me over with the price of this particular product. It states that this lasts for 3-4 shampoos and I have to say it seemed to continue with its protection with the first. I only wash my hair twice a week. You would have to take that into consideration. Is it the actual washes or days? When I washed the second time after a few days, it wasn't a noticeable staying power. In all honesty, this is a good product. My hair had some shine although it was nothing magnificent. It had a nice smoothness, but again, nothing mind blowing. There wasn't noticeable staying power for me. It did live up to the humidity protection. With making certain the hair is coated and taking into consideration the amount of hair one has, the lasting quality of the bottles don't look too promising. It has a light scent however nothing memorable. It's pretty neutral. There's no stickiness. It doesn't mat the hair and actually seems to help with comb through. To sum it up, I can't quite scream the praise. For the price tag, it should live up to the hype a considerable bit more that what it does. It should certainly have a longer life span. Maybe others found the jackpot here, but I don't see myself spending the money again unless I just can't find the humidity control in something cheaper. Nothing magical stood out. I would have expected better with all the glorious statements and videos. I think a lot of what we miss when watching these videos are the use of the other products to achieve the results they get. Notice it isn't just the Dream Coat. That's hundreds of dollars on products to even attempt high-end, salon quality results which is what they are suggesting here.
faceoff_positive.headline: Doesn't quite live up to the "WOW"

faceoff_negative.comments: My hair is down to the middle of my back I mean LONGGG. It's really thick, curly, coarse, frizzy, and dry. Doesn't matter what I put in it, my hair always looks dry and frizzy. I used the 6.7 oz bottle and it lasted me 5 washes. The only times it worked were when I would absolutely soak my hair from root to tip with dream coat and then dried my hair instantly. Couldn't let my hair air dry and then blow it dry or it wouldn't work either. Obviously this makes this product ridiculously expensive for me. That being said, when I soaked my hair with the spray and dried it instantly (says on the bottle but in case you missed it you can't use any other products out of the shower with it. I didn't even attempt to and I'm glad I didn't because it works) my hair was softer, smoother, and instead of poofing up and being light weight and all over the place it actually had weight to it that kept it looking and feeling like naturally pin straight hair. If you have my hair type you know what I'm talking about. I've tried so many products throughout the years (I'm 30) and nothing has ever done this to my hair. No amount of straightening has done this- nothing has. Also for reference I use a giant round brush- the biggest out there, and blow dry my hair smooth and I do get every curl and kink out that way. Again, I've been doing this for years and it comes easy to me for some reason. Probably the giant round brush. Got it from Ulta, it's ceramic with wire bristles in case you have my hair type. I also have to put that flat nozzle on my blow dryer or it won't work so you can try that too. High heat and high air flow setting on the blow dryer as well. In order to get the naturally pin straight results I have to blow dry like that and straighten it then hair spray. But it works. I'm trying the big bottle now to see how long it lasts. If it runs out in a few months (I wash my hair 1-2 times a week) then I'll have to buy it like once a year and go without most of the time because it's too much. I hope they lower the price one day if other people are having this issue too because the results when you figure out how you need to use it for your hair, are amazing. Hope this was helpful and not an hour wasted reading this chapter book review. You're welcome or I'm sorry.
faceoff_negative.headline: If you have long thick hair it is EXPENSIVE
